# MKDistanceFormatter.Units.metric

**Case**

The format uses metric units.

## Declaration

```swift
case metric
```

## Constants

- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.default**: The format uses the locale information to determine which units to use.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.imperial**: The format uses imperial units.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.imperialWithYards**: The format uses imperial units that include measurements in yards.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.default**: The format uses the locale information to determine which units to use.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.imperial**: The format uses imperial units.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.Units.imperialWithYards**: The format uses imperial units that include measurements in yards.
